metadata.description: You better watch out. You better not cry. You better not sneeze. Why? Because Santa Claus comes to Houppeland every day! And here, Christmas decorations, trees, and wreaths are mandatory, as is having a clean bill of health. It's a celebration, after all! A party! And everyone has to be happy and healthy... whether they want to or not. Otherwise they'll have the merciless Jolly Fellow brigade to deal with. Prepare for a Christmas tale of nightmare proportions.
metadata.name: Joylandia
